name: Notion Creator Guide
description: So either you've heard about Notion or not, it's currently trending everywhere. People are creating software, books, lists, and many other things with it. rawData.description: So either you've heard about Notion or not, it's currently trending everywhere. People are creating software, books, lists, and many other things with it. The best part is that they're making a lot of money as well. I also jumped on this train and have so far generated over $60,000 by selling Notion templates.I wanted to share my knowledge and help others discover the amazing feeling of making money while you sleep so I created this guide. If you're new to digital products and want to give it a shot by creating and selling Notion templates, this guide is created specially for you.
